thread.title: Still a great hotel although starting to look tired in places
thread.title_full: Still a great hotel although starting to look tired in places - Review of Novotel Paris Centre Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: janetdbarker
title: Still a great hotel although starting to look tired in places
text:
First, I'd like to thank the hotel reception to allow us to have late check out leaving the hotel at 4pm.
We had stayed at the hotel two years previously and it is now starting to look tired in places.
It was a very busy weekend at the hotel, a tad busy for us.
Cocktails were great in the bar. Breakfast is very busy and you sometimes have to queue but good selection.
You can't beat the hotel for location.10 minutes walk from the Eiffel Tower and 2 minutes from a shopping street.
One word of warning - when getting a cab from Orly, we went to the taxi rank and were overcharged by a rogue taxi driver (con artist) and ended up paying euro 70. If getting a cab make sure its a Taxi Parisian! There's a set fee of euro 30. Put a dampener on the start of our holiday.
